title: Quarkus Gradle quarkusDev task is automatically terminated.
body:
### Describe the bug

Quarkus Gradle quarkusDev task is automatically terminated.
There's no problem with the built jar and native image.

```
PS E:\ciyuan> .\gradlew quarkusDev
Starting a Gradle Daemon (subsequent builds will be faster)
```
